description: March 8th is International Women's Day, and with it comes the perfect opportunity to celebrate women in all sectors of life. Why not make a cocktail that you can customize this year—the Cherry Bomb Shot!The best part about this drink? You can substitute almost any other fruit-flavored&nbsp;vodka in place of cherry.
name: Cherry Bomb Shot
recipeIngredient: ½ can of Red Bull or other energy drink

recipeInstructions.name: Pour the Red Bull with the splash of grenadine into a highball glass.
recipeInstructions.text: Pour the Red Bull with the splash of grenadine into a highball glass.

recipeInstructions.name: Pour the cherry vodka into a shot glass and drop it into the highball glass.
recipeInstructions.text: Pour the cherry vodka into a shot glass and drop it into the highball glass.
